entry.title: Hey, I'm Suryaa.
entry.content:
^ That's me in a train

Life Story:

Um, I’m a fun guy. Obviously, I love the field of computer science. I mean, there’s just more questions you have to ask me in order for me to tell you about myself. I just can’t give you a whole spiel.

What I’m Doing Now:

  • Pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree in CS from the University of Maryland 🐢
  • Interning at Fidelity Investments This Summer
  • Creating Software for Tensordock as a Marketplace Product Manager
  • Working on multiple quant/decentralized finance projects

Some Goals:

  • Learn C++ ✅
  • Make some meaningful contributions at internships ✅
  • Run up the LinkedIn connections 📈
  • Pray the Celtics win a chip 🍀

entry.title: Projects
entry.content: When I get time I’ll throw em in here.
